original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, the Noble Vairocana King of Light.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha.🔽Tadyathā:

original: tadya th'a / ka la ka la /
analyzed: tadya th'a / ka la ka la /

original: bee ro tsa na rashmi sanytso di te a'a gatstsha /
analyzed: bee ro tsa na rashmi sanytso di te a'a gatstsha /

original: a'arya a'a k'a sha garbha mah'a k'a ru ni ka p'u ra ya ha sh'a na /
analyzed: a'arya a'a k'a sha garbha mah'a k'a ru ni ka p'u ra ya ha sh'a na /

original: dh'a ra ya buddhe bi shtsa ya na /
analyzed: dh'a ra ya buddhe bi shtsa ya na /

translated: By reciting this, one will be successful.

original: mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang; dug sbyar ma dang / byad stems rnams kyis mi tshugs so //
analyzed: mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang; dug sbyar ma dang / byad stems rnams kyis mi tshugs so //
translated: One will not be harmed by weapons, fire, water, poison, concocted poison, or sorcery.

original: rgyal po dang / chom rkun la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do //
analyzed: rgyal po dang / chom rkun la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do //
translated: No one, not even a king, a thief, or anyone else, will be able to harm them.

original: gang du bris te bzhag pa der yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du bris te bzhag pa der yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Wherever this dhāraṇī is written down and kept, no epidemic, harm, or contagious disease will occur.

original: dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will also attain the samādhi called Stainless Light.

original: 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so //
translated: This concludes the noble Dhāraṇī of the Essence of Vairocana.
